title: using isv:owncloud:community yum repository yields non-existent dependencies (centos 6)
body:
### expected behaviour
should install owncloud and required dependencies.

### actual behaviour
install failed citing missing dependencies that don't actually exist in the distro

### steps to reproduce
1. cd /etc/yum.repos.d/
2. wget http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/isv:owncloud:community/centos_centos-6/isv:owncloud:community.repo
3. yum install owncloud

### server configuration
operating system: centos 6.3 - patched to current (as of 07 march 2013)

web server: not relevant to this issue

database: not relevant 

php version: not relevant

owncloud version: supposedly the current release in the yum repository

### logs
here's the output from "yum install owncloud":

[root@cloudstore yum.repos.d]# yum install owncloud
loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
 * base: mirrors.syringanetworks.net
 * extras: centos-mirror.jchost.net
 * updates: centos.icyboards.com
isv_owncloud_community                                   | 1.3 kb     00:00     
isv_owncloud_community/primary                           | 2.6 kb     00:00     
isv_owncloud_community                                                    10/10
setting up install process
resolving dependencies
--> running transaction check
---> package owncloud.noarch 0:4.5.7-77.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: owncloud-3rdparty for package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch
--> processing dependency: php-pear-mdb2-driver-mysqli for package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch
--> processing dependency: php-pear-net-curl for package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch
--> running transaction check
---> package owncloud.noarch 0:4.5.7-77.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: php-pear-mdb2-driver-mysqli for package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch
--> processing dependency: php-pear-net-curl for package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch
---> package owncloud-3rdparty.noarch 0:4.5.7-77.1 will be installed
--> finished dependency resolution
error: package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch (isv_owncloud_community)
           requires: php-pear-mdb2-driver-mysqli
error: package: owncloud-4.5.7-77.1.noarch (isv_owncloud_community)
           requires: php-pear-net-curl
 you could try using --skip-broken to work around the problem
 you could try running: rpm -va --nofiles --nodigest
[root@cloudstore yum.repos.d]#
